divs: Sighting DetailsNoted a bright object in the sky at approximately 22:45 on November 5, 2009, south and east of Covington LA (would guess to be over the general vicinity Abita Springs, LA) flickering (indicating not a planet), but not moving for 2+ hours. After getting binoculars (Tasco 10x50mm) to see multi colored lights (red, green and white) which did not move from its location. No idea of size or shape really, though presumably large as it was high in the sky and some color was noticable by the naked eye. Could not determine shape of the object as I could only see the lights which seemed to flicker but only went off once for a split second then back on. Just very curious. Have never seen anything like this before, heard about it, just never seen it.
Summary: Extended viewing of object via binoculars - stationary, multicolored light object in the sky.
